text: What's a Wife Worth? is a 1921 silent American melodrama film directed by Christy Cabanne and starring Casson Ferguson, Ruth Renick, and Cora Drew. It was released on March 27, 1921. ==Cast list== * Casson Ferguson as Bruce Morrison * Ruth Renick as Rose Kendall * Cora Drew as Her aunt * Virginia Caldwell as Jane Penfield * Alec B. Francis as James Morrison * Howard Gaye as Henry Burton * Lillian Langdon as Mrs. Penfield * Maxfield Stanley as Murray Penfield * Charles Wyngate as Dr. Durant * Helen Lynch as Girl in the Retrospect ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:Films directed by Christy Cabanne Category:Film Booking Offices of America films Category:American silent feature films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:American drama films Category:1921 drama films Category:1921 films Category:Melodramas
title: What's a Wife Worth?
